errorMessages.authenticationErrorBody: Connection with Microsoft 365 has been lost and data might be outdated. Please refresh the page.

email.detailDescription: Default template for emails. It will fill the subject with an issue's summary.

meetings.detailDescription: Default template for meetings. It will fill the title with an issue's key and summary. The body will contain a link to the issue.

chat.detailDescription: Default template for chats. It will fill the title with an issue's key and summary. The body will contain a link to the issue.

templateChooser.noTemplatesGlobalAdminTooltip: No templates have been configured yet. You can create new templates in the global app settings or project settings.
templateChooser.noTemplatesProjectAdminTooltip: No templates have been configured yet. You can create new templates for your project in the project settings.
